name: Justice Minute (Grande Confiture 2016)
description:
A game made for Grande Confiture 2016, a game jam organised a week-end in France in several locations (Paris, Nantes, Valenciennes) and online: http://www.grandeconfiture.com/ (website in french).

The theme of this jam was The Law! Our team, located in Paris, came up with this idea of a Wario Ware x Ace Attorney game, except that we play the judge.

You only require a mouse to give justice with your almighty gavel! But be careful, the game only lasts 1 minute so think fast and carefully.

Game in french for now.
